In that case, it's great that you have a local pet store that you can rely on for pet supplies. Since you liked the quality of the food bowl, you might want to try contacting the store owner again to ask for recommendations on pet beds from similar brands or ones that match the quality.

They might be able to suggest some options that would complement the food bowl nicely, or even special order a pet bed for you if they don't have it in stock. Since you have a good relationship with the store owner, they might also be able to give you some insider tips on what brands or products are popular among pet owners in your area.

If you'd like to explore online options as well, you could try searching for pet beds from brands that are known for their quality and durability, such as:

* Outward Hound
* Pet Zone
* Frisco
* MidWest Homes for Pets
* Armarkat

These brands offer a range of pet beds in different styles, materials, and prices, so you might be able to find one that matches your budget and Luna's preferences.

Remember to read reviews and do your research before making a purchase, especially if you're shopping online. And if you're still unsure, you could always ask the store owner for their opinion or advice!
